page.title: 11Trade and Energy in Wetton
page.content:
{Trade in Wetton} Trade in Wetton is not all that bad. Wetton pub does well especially in the summer and Bank Holidays, The bed and breakfast places do a lot of trade on Bank Holidays, any other holidays and weekends - they are always full. A butcher comes around in a van from Butterton. He delivers everywhere in Wetton.
{Energy used in Wetton} Most people who live in Wetton use electricity for cooking. There is also liquid propane gas used for cooking. Most people use cars for transport but there are other alternatives such as cycles and horses. Most people who live in Wetton use coal or logs for heating. Generators are also used for energy.
